short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab extension which shows the current time and the Astronomy Picture of the Day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
New Tab extension which shows the current time and the Astronomy Picture of the Day.
Additionally displays the provided explanation by professional Astronomers.
